title: Senior Business Development Manager

description:
Company Description

Recognized as one of the top 10 emerging giants in the Asia-Pacific region by KPMG and HSBC, Artisse is a pioneer in the field of human-centric image AI models. We have developed the world's first AI-driven photography app that allows users to create entirely new, personalized photos instantly. Our consumer app has been ranked as the top new photo app in 20 countries and featured in TechCrunch, Daily Mail, and Forbes. Artisse also offers business solutions across numerous sectors such as advertising, modeling, lifestyle, tourism, and intellectual property, focusing on leveraging image AI to bring a transformative edge to conventional practices in these industries. Our leadership come from the top consulting and business institutions in the world.

We are seeking a Business Development Manager for our B2B team, who will be instrumental in expanding our market presence and enhancing our business solutions portfolio. The ideal candidate will spearhead our growth initiatives, focusing on establishing and nurturing strategic partnerships in the advertising, fashion, lifestyle, tourism, and hospitality sectors. You will work closely with product, marketing, and sales teams to identify new business opportunities, develop tailored solutions, and execute go-to-market strategies that align with our business goals. Your role will involve conducting market research, engaging with potential clients and partners, and driving initiatives that enhance our value proposition to business clients.

Responsibilities:
• Develop and implement growth strategies to expand Artisse's business solutions in targeted sectors.
• Identify, evaluate, and pursue new business opportunities and partnerships that align with the company's strategic goals.
• Work closely with product and marketing teams to understand client needs and trends, ensuring our solutions meet market demands.
• Lead the negotiation and closing of deals with new clients and partners, fostering long-term business relationships.
• Collaborate with the product team to provide market insights and client feedback, influencing the development of new features and business solutions.
• Plan and execute go-to-market strategies for business solutions, coordinating with marketing and sales teams to ensure successful launches.
• Monitor and analyze market trends, competitive landscape, and industry developments to inform strategic decisions.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in Business, Economics, Finance, or a related field.
• Must have minimum 8 years of experience in business development, sales, or a related field, preferably in tech, AI-driven applications, or B2B SaaS.
• Minimum of 5 years experience as a people manager leading & managing a B2B sales team or customers service team.
• Proven track record of identifying and closing new business opportunities, and establishing strategic partnerships.
• Strong understanding of the sectors we serve, including advertising, fashion, lifestyle, tourism, and hospitality, with the ability to identify and articulate value propositions tailored to these industries.
• Excellent negotiation, communication, and presentation skills, with the ability to engage and persuade high-level decision-makers.
• Proficient in market research, data analysis, and performance metrics to guide strategic decisions.
• Dynamic, self-motivated individual with a strong entrepreneurial spirit, capable of working in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
• Available to start immediately.

This role is designed for a forward-thinking individual passionate about leveraging AI technology to transform business practices. If you are adept at driving growth and building meaningful relationships in a technology-driven landscape, we encourage you to apply and help shape the future of our business solutions at Artisse.
